storyInfo: The Rat King appears and rescues Waai Fu and Jaye. Capone stabs Gambino and hopes to surrender, but is rejected by the Rat King. The Mafia had long been swallowed by the Rat King, and everything dances in the palm of his hand.

attributes.content: ...I'm tired of this.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Nng——!
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: You're strong. And you've shown me some really cool kung fu.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: But I can't keep playin' with you like this.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Real sorry about this, but you, your buddy, and that traitor, you all gotta die here.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Boys, weapons ready.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Ready!
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: So you're going to win with sheer numbers...?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: It ain't so simple, Gambino.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Listen up, once the so-called 'boss' opens fire, that's the official announcement of the end of your affiliation with the Gambino Family. Don't go easy on 'em.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Got it!
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: Waai Fu, this side too...
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: We're getting boxed in.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Hah. We got the Family all split up, and the prey becomes the predator. We got a nice chaotic battle here each fallin' into each other's traps.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: It's just like that time back in Siracusa... But this time, it's a gamble we got no choice but to win.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Too bad you've always been a shit gambler.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: All right. That's enough. Settle down.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: What!
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: You finally crawled out of your filthy hole?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Mr. Gambino, I am truly sorry, but I've given you and your Family so many chances.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: We got no trust between us at all. You really think I'd hand the Family over to some non-Sicilian freak?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Sicilian. While I have not once in my life set foot in a Siracusan city, I do know that you are unworthy of describing yourself as such.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: ...What are you gonna do?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: The time for questions has passed, young man. And you have broken the rules far too many times.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Once was your transgression, another was yours. But it matters not. You have both overstepped your bounds.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You goin' back on your deal?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: I made no deal.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Hmph. You really think you can take us?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: You sit on a throne in a stinking sewer, telling desperate people who got no choice but to throw down their lives what to do. That's you.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: It behooves you, as head of your household, to broaden your horizons.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Compared to everything we have been through, your little Siracusan fiasco was a stubbed toe.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Shut up!
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Have you ever seen a true onslaught? What it means to truly have barbarians at your gates?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: When moving cities crash against one another, smoke chokes the skies, and the dying infected rot away by cesspools, crying in hopeless agony?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You know nothing. And yet you think to fight a city.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: (He's immensely powerful... him and that woman with him...)
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: (Shit, we have to at least stop provoking the Rat King... now is not the time...)
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: You think you stand for all of Lungmen?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Lungmen certainly cannot stand for me.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Enough talk! Haah——!
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: No one will permit you to strike this old man.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Get back, Waai Fu!
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: Out of my way!
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Thank you. You are Ah Fil. I've heard your story.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You're the one Uncle always talks about...
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: Heh, my old friend.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I thank you for helping Lungmen put a stop to them. And I thank you for your pursuit of justice.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Now, please leave.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I promised many times to many people that I would not let the children get mixed up in such matters.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: ...Waai Fu.
attributes.name: Jaye

attributes.content: Fine.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: The children are gone. And with them your hope of victory.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Put down your weapons, kneel before me, and your 'Family' will have at least some chance to survive.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Do you really think your threats mean anything?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: ...You are on our land. It means to us what Siracusa means to you. You must know this much.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You still have some chips on the table, young man. Wouldn't you like to save them?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Qui- quicksand?! Run!
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: Aaaaaagh! My hand! D- don't touch the sand!
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: You cocky——
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Calm yourself, young man. I don't need my hands to stop your sword.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Look around you at your companions. This city has bled so much already. I really don't want to see 'Family' killing one another on the program.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: This is your last chance.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I ain't gonna turn coward again. Leaving Siracusa was the last step backwards for my Family.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: I'd rather die here like a true Sicilian than ever let the enemy see me run off with my tail between my legs.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Perhaps in your mind, this is the way for a warrior to behave. But for a leader, going too far is as bad as not going far enough.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You should reflect, and introspect. Unfortunately, it is too late.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Aaaagh!!
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: ...This is the end, Gambino. You should never have bet the whole Family on this.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Capone, you, you son of a——!
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Calm down. We don't want you to go out too hard.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Gah!
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Funny. You don't look surprised at all. Were you waiting for me to do this?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: What are you thinking, backstabbing boss-killer?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I'll offer up the whole Family. We're gonna live here, in Lungmen. And we're not gonna fall on our swords for no good reason.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: It's too bad... if you were truly willing to work together, that woman never would have exiled you from Siracusa.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You know a lot about us... But I'm not gonna ask. It's Lungmen.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Indeed. It's Lungmen.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You mean I should be easier on you, since you're willing to personally discipline the disobedient?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: My Family will take orders from you.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: 'Your Family.'
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You are simply describing the situation as it is. You made so many miscalculations you have no other choice.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Right. It's been a hell of a night. I've had a lotta setbacks. But that's business.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Mmm... Business.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You're absolutely right. This is an excellent deal. Fair and equitable.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Then——!
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: But, Mr. Capone, it's Lungmen.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: It's not me.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I have no need of your loyalty. Never did.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You... from the very beginning, you were...
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: It's what it is. We gotta survive.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: When you tried to worm your way into Lungmen, your mutual suspicion ground turned you up into a sheet of sand. A stone is hard to break. But sand? I can easily scoop up a handful.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I have no love of trickery. It's really no fun at all. What matters is what I said a few minutes ago: I truly do not wish to see family massacre family...
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: And yet you did harm to your own brother, right in front of me.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Now for this, I would not say you've crossed the ultimate line. So I will not kill you.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: It's just that, since you disobeyed me, I'm afraid I have no need of such a crafty and conniving friend.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You...! You had these moles in the Family from the very beginning! And you waited until we got at each other's throats, and then you...!
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Gah!
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: You're wasting your life on idle words, young man.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Heh... while you toyed around with the power over them, your underlings were mulling it all over for you. Truly remarkable.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Their loyalty has bought them a chance to survive in Lungmen. And a life for each of you as well.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Now then, you have seen for yourselves the choices made by these two leaders, and now the time has come for you to fulfill your commitments.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: ...Heh.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Rat King. No, Lin. Lin Gray, you're more Sicilian than either of us.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: You tore my honor to shreds, and then you let me live? Are you trying to humiliate me?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Astonishing. To save your life, you don't hesitate to draw a sword on your own brother, your own leader, and yet when I offer to let you live, you are determined to die?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I thought only the one out cold over there would gnash his teeth at me so.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: That's because I too am 'Sicilian.'
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Or I guess I should ask if you really thought you could wipe out one of Siracusa's 'Families' and get away with it?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Idle threats. You must know that nobody will go to war over an erased Family. Take a step back and see that even though some hopeless, scattered warriors may ignorantly think to act...
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: ...I say let them come. Let them be torn to shreds by the true rage of this city.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Grr!
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: You alone have no power to stand against us.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Now. Go.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: ...I guess my life just has to go on for now, but one day you'll regret that you didn't kill me, a true Sicilian, today.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: No question.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: ...If I were to send a man to kill him now, what would you do?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You wouldn't do that.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: But what he said is true. I have no reason to be so lenient with a Siracusan mafioso.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: We had a deal. When we came face to face, we'd defect, and you'd let the others go.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Unless, of course, the remaining mobsters force a fight to the death.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Heh heh. Don't worry. He didn't mean that. He's simply a coward who wants to live. But his anger is not feigned.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: An unrighteous man has nothing for which to live.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Remarkable. His negligible dignity saved his life, in the end.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: ...Thanks.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Go. It is time to bring this evening to its conclusion.
attributes.name: Rat King
